item.name: 1. auth

request.description:
Create a new user account using a **valid email, first name, last name and a password**.  
  
**Response Status :**  
\- 201 Created : user created successfully  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field or user email already used

**⚠️** Once logged in, **set bearer_token environment current value** to the *access code* you get in the response so you will be authorized for the next requests.

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field  
\- 401 Unauthorized : no active account found with the given credentials

response.name: error : wrong credentials

item.description:
# Authentication Collection

This collection contains 2 uses cases for user to Signup and Login.

## Get started

*   **SIGNUP :** Create a new user account using a valid email and a password.
*   **LOGIN :** Login to access your account getting an access bearer token.
    

## Variables Reference

The following variables should be setup as Postman environment variables before running any tests.

| **Variable** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| host | The host. In our case, the django virtual host : [http://127.0.0.1:8000](http://127.0.0.1:8000) |

item.name: 2. projects

request.description:
Get the list of all projects that you are contributor.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired

Get informations about a project using **project_id**.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not contributor of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project not found. wrong id.

response.name: error : access forbidden
response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT CONTRIBUTOR OF THIS PROJECT."

request.description:
Create a new project using **title, description and type**.

| **Field Name** | **Type** |
| --- | --- |
| title | string (max_length=60) |
| description | string (max_length=512, can be blank) |
| type | string (max_length=60, can be blank) |

**Prerequisites :**  
\- each project title has to be **unique**.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token

**Response Status :**  
\- 201 Created : project created successfully  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field or project title already used  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired

Update informations of a project using **project_id.**

| **Field Name** | **Type** |
| --- | --- |
| title | string (max_length=60) |
| description | string (max_length=512, can be blank) |
| type | string (max_length=60, can be blank) |

**Prerequisites :**  
\- **only author** of projects can update project information. Project contributors are not allowed to.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field or project title already used  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not author of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project not found. wrong id.

response.name: error : access forbidden
response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT AUTHOR OF THIS PROJECT."

request.description:
Delete a project using **project_id**.

**Prerequisites** :  
\- **only author** of projects can delete a project. Project contributors are not allowed to.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not author of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project not found. wrong id.

response.name: error : access forbidden
response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT AUTHOR OF THIS PROJECT."

item.description:
# Projects Collection

This collection contains 5 uses cases for user to create, update, delete a project and get informations about.

## Get started

*   **GET projects list :** Get the list of all projects that you are contributor.
*   **GET project information :** Get informations about a project.
*   **CREATE project :** Create a new project.
*   **UPDATE project :** Update informations of a project.
*   **DELETE project :** Delete a project.
    

## Prerequisites

User need at least to be contributor of the project to access collection requests (except **GET projects list** and **CREATE project** requests).

## Variables Reference

The following variables should be setup as Postman environment variables before running any tests.

| **Variable** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| host | The host. In our case, the django virtual host : [http://127.0.0.1:8000](http://127.0.0.1:8000) |
| bearer_token | Token you get when login. Needed for authorization. |
| project_id | Id of the project in database. Type : integer. |

item.name: 3. contributors
GET contributors list of a project

request.description:
Get the list of all contributors of a project that you are contributor.

**Prerequisites :**
User need to be **contributor of the project**.

**Needed :**
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not contributor of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project not found. wrong id.

response.name: error : access forbidden
response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT CONTRIBUTOR OF THIS PROJECT."

request.description:
Add a user to the contributors list of a project.

**Prerequisites :**  
User need to be **author of the project**.

**Needed :**  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id  
\- user_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 201 Created : user successfully added to contributors list of project  
\- 200 OK : user to add already contributor of the project  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or user not found. wrong id.

response.name: successfull contributor add
response.body: "USER your2@email.com ADDED TO CONTRIBUTORS OF PROJECT !"

response.name: error : access forbidden
response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT AUTHOR OF THIS PROJECT."

request.description:
Remove a user from the contributors list of a project.

**Prerequisites :**  
User need to be **author of the project**.

**Needed :**  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id  
\- user_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or user not found. wrong id.

response.name: successful contributor remove
response.body: "USER your2@email.com REMOVED FROM CONTRIBUTORS OF PROJECT !"

response.name: error : user to add not contributor
response.body: "USER super@oc.com IS NOT CONTRIBUTOR OF PROJECT !"

response.name: error : access forbidden
response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT AUTHOR OF THIS PROJECT."

item.description:
# Contributors Collection

This collection contains 3 uses cases for user to get the contributors list of a project, add and remove a contributor to/from a project.

## Get started

*   **GET contributors list of a project** **:** Get the list of all contributors of a project.
*   **ADD contributor to a project** : Add a user to the contributors list of a project.
*   **REMOVE contributor from a project** **:** Remove a user from the contributors list of a project.
    

## Variables Reference

The following variables should be setup as Postman environment variables before running any tests.

| **Variable** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| host | The host. In our case, the django virtual host : [http://127.0.0.1:8000](http://127.0.0.1:8000) |
| bearer_token | Token you get when login. Needed for authorization. |
| project_id | Id of the project in database. Type : integer. |
| user_id | Id of a user in database. Type : integer. |

item.name: 4. issues

request.description:
Get the list of all issues of a project that you are contributor.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not contributor of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project not found. wrong id.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS
GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

request.description:
Create a new issue using **title, desc, tag, priority, assignee_user and status**.

| **Field Name** | **Type** |
| --- | --- |
| title | string (max_length=60) |
| desc | string (max_length=512, can be blank) |
| tag | BUG / TASK / IMPROVEMENT |
| priority | LOW / MEDIUM / HIGH |
| assignee_user | integer corresponding to a user_id |
| status | TODO / INPROGRESS / DONE |

**Prerequisites :**  
\- issue title must be **unique** within a project  
\- assignee_user must be the id of a user which is **contributor** to the project

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 201 Created : issue created successfully  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field or issue title already used within the project  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not contributor of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project not found. wrong id.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS
GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS
GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

response.name: error : title already used

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

request.description:
Update issue informations using **issue_id**.

| **Field Name** | **Type** |
| --- | --- |
| title | string (max_length=60) |
| desc | string (max_length=512, can be blank) |
| tag | BUG / TASK / IMPROVEMENT |
| priority | LOW / MEDIUM / HIGH |
| assignee_user | integer corresponding to a user_id |
| status | TODO / INPROGRESS / DONE |

**Prerequisites :**  
\- **only author** of issue can update issue information. Project contributors are not allowed to.  
\- issue title must be **unique** within a project  
\- assignee_user must be the id of a user which is **contributor** to the project

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id  
\- issue_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK : issue updated successfully  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field or issue title already used within the project  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or issue not found. wrong id.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

response.name: error : title already used

response.name: error : access forbidden

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT CONTRIBUTOR OF THIS PROJECT."

request.description:
Delete an issue using **issue_id**.

**Prerequisites** :  
\- **only author** of issue can delete issue. Project contributors are not allowed to.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id  
\- issue_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK : issue deleted successfully  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or issue not found. wrong id.

item.description:
# Issues Collection

This collection contains 4 uses cases for user to create, update, delete an issue and get informations about.

## Get started

*   **GET issues list :** Get the list of all issues of a project.
*   **CREATE issue :** Create a new issue.
*   **UPDATE issue :** Update informations of an issue.
*   **DELETE issue :** Delete an issue.
    

## Prerequisites

User need at least to be **contributor of the project** to access collection requests.

## **Variables Reference**

The following variables should be setup as Postman environment variables before running any tests.

| **Variable** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| host | The host. In our case, the django virtual host : [http://127.0.0.1:8000](http://127.0.0.1:8000) |
| bearer_token | Token you get when login. Needed for authorization. |
| project_id | Id of the project in database. Type : integer. |
| issue_id | Id of an issue in database. Type : integer. |

item.name: 5. comments
GET comments list of an issue

request.description:
Get the list of all comments of an issue.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id  
\- issue_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not contributor of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or issue not found. wrong id.

response.name: error : access forbidden
response.body: "ACCESS FORBIDDEN. USER IS NOT CONTRIBUTOR OF THIS PROJECT."

request.description:
Get informations about a comment using **comment_id**.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id  
\- issue_id  
\- comment_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not contributor of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or issue or comment not found. wrong id.

| **Field Name** | **Type** |
| --- | --- |

\- issue_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 201 Created : comment created successfully  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden. user is not contributor of this project.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or issue not found. wrong id.

request.description:
Update issue informations using **comment_id**.

| **Field Name** | **Type** |

\- **only author** of comment can update comment information. Project contributors are not allowed to.

**Needed** :

\- issue_id  
\- comment_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK : comment updated successfully  
\- 400 Bad Request : wrong data format, missing field  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or issue or comment not found. wrong id.

request.description:
Delete a comment using **comment_id**.

\- **only author** of comment can delete comment. Project contributors are not allowed to.

**Needed** :  
\- bearer_token  
\- project_id  
\- issue_id  
\- comment_id

**Response Status :**  
\- 200 OK : comment deleted successfully  
\- 401 Unauthorized : token is invalid or expired  
\- 403 Forbidden : access forbidden.  
\- 404 Not Found : project or issue or comment not found. wrong id.

item.description:
# Comments Collection

This collection contains 5 uses cases for user to create, update, delete a comment and get informations about.

## Get started

*   **GET comments list of an issue :** Get the list of all comments of an issue.
*   **GET comment information :** Get informations about a comment.
*   **CREATE comment :** Create a new comment.
*   **UPDATE comment :** Update informations of a comment.
*   **DELETE comment :** Delete a comment.
    

## Prerequisites

User need at least to be contributor of the project to access collection requests.

## Variables Reference

The following variables should be setup as Postman environment variables before running any tests.

| **Variable** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| host | The host. In our case, the django virtual host : [http://127.0.0.1:8000](http://127.0.0.1:8000) |
| bearer_token | Token you get when login. Needed for authorization. |
| project_id | Id of the project in database. Type : integer. |
| issue_id | Id of an issue in database. Type : integer. |
| comment_id | Id of a comment in database. Type : integer. |
